title: MC-CL启动器! Alpha 1.0.0发布!!!![暗球制造]
author: higifi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 higifi 于 2012-5-27 08:02 编辑 

MC-CL_Project Alpha 1.0.0 ReleasedMinecraft-CommandLine是一款由C语言写成的开源MC启动器.
IDE为C-Free 5.0 专业版.
本软件遵守GNU 通用公共许可协议.
截图:已知BUG:
其实这个不算BUG啦…
 

下载地址:

Alpha 1.0.0: http://higifizone.tk/mc-cl-project/MC-CL.zip
Alpha 1.0.0 源代码: http://higifizone.tk/mc-cl-project/MC-CL_Source.zip
分流:
http://code.google.com/p/minecraft-commandline/downloads/list
http://115.com/folder/fau0q8f6
